entries.title: LastPass users: Your info and password vault data are now in hackers’ hands
entries.description: Password manager says breach it disclosed in August was much worse than thought.

entries.title: With voice assistants in trouble, Home Assistant starts a local alternative
entries.description: With Big Tech reconsidering voice profitability, Home Assistant enters the fray.

entries.title: TikTok cops to running “covert surveillance campaign” on Western journalists
entries.description: Fired employees “misused their authority to obtain access to TikTok user data.”

entries.title: Backup Soyuz can’t get to ISS before late February
entries.description: In the wake of a Soyuz coolant loss, NASA and Roscosmos still exploring options.

entries.title: Blu-ray player gathering dust? Turn it into a laser-scanning microscope
entries.description: Not as powerful as a commerical one, but thousands cheaper.

entries.title: Driver updates will fix abnormally high power use for AMD’s new RX 7900 GPUs
entries.description: Video playback, high-refresh screens, and multi-monitor setups can cause issues.

entries.title: Compromised dispatch system helped move taxis to front of the line
entries.description: Defendants allegedly conspired with Russians, drew as many as 1,000 daily trips.

entries.title: Leaked details show how Biden could save TikTok from being blocked in the US
entries.description: A former Secret Service agent recommended to oversee TikTok's US division.

entries.title: Eight-car Thanksgiving pileup blamed on Tesla “Full Self-Driving” software
entries.description: California Highway Patrol say only Tesla knows if the system was active.

entries.title: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried’s top associates plead guilty to US charges
entries.description: Feds say other execs are cooperating as crypto entrepreneur is extradited.

entries.title: Mastodon is hurtling toward a tipping point
entries.description: With rising popularity comes rising costs, culture shifts—and potential legal risks.

entries.title: Here’s why electric vehicles need EV-specific tires
entries.description: The differences between ICE vehicles and EVs go all the way down to the tarmac.
